meta.name: Anti Delete
meta.description: Does what it says on the tin
meta.changelog: Added options, including for filtering users, channels, and guilds in or out of the plugin functionality.

locations.description: Choose which locations the plugin will be active in

guildFilter.description: Disallow the plugin from working in these guilds, use Invert Guild Filter to allow only these guilds.

invertGuildFilter.description: Invert the guild filter, only allowing the plugin to work in the guilds specified in Guild ID Filter.

channelFilter.description: Disallow the plugin from working in these channels, use Invert Channel Filter to allow only these channels.

invertChannelFilter.description: Invert the channel filter, only allowing the plugin to work in the channels specified in Channel ID Filter.

userFilter.description: Disallow the plugin from working for these users, use Invert User Filter to allow only these users.

invertUserFilter.description: Invert the user filter, only allowing the plugin to work for the users specified in User ID Filter.
